title: Download gate - Social Media Connectivity
snippet: Develop a website that hosts mp3 or videos and requests a follow in social media from the person trying to download the content in exchange for the download. The person trying to download the mp3 would have to follow the specified instagram profile, "like" a facebook page, subscribe to a youtube channel, and provide an email address. These options could be activated all at once or a subset of them on a case by case basis. The website will need to verify the follow, like or subscription. Also collect the email address for the specific mail list on that download. Once this is cleared, they can proceed to download the asset.
